descriptions.title: Timely maintenance guarantees reliability
text: A service center has been organized at QHSE-Akbarys to perform periodic and emergency repairs.

descriptions.title: You are in the right hands
text: The service center of QHSE-Akbarys company professionally services its own equipment and equipment of customers. The company's employees are certified by the equipment manufacturer.
All technical means involved in the maintenance of QHSE-Akbarys undergo periodic inspection and maintenance in accordance with the PPR schedule and operational documentation.

thirdBlock.title: Regional operations
descriptions: The company's specialists work at the customer's facilities and in specialized laboratories located in the regions of Kazakhstan.

Local service units have been established in large industrial regions. They fully and quickly respond to requests and reduce the service time. This allows you to quickly carry out service support of the customer's equipment. In addition to the central Ural division, such service services have been established in Astana, Aksai, Aktobe, Atyrau, Aktau.

fouthBlock.title: Qualified personnel
fouthBlock.description: The staff of the SC regularly improves their qualifications, and also undergoes extraordinary training when implementing a new tool and service regulations.
